location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Copy of letter No 1662/694 of 1872 from Colonel Lewis Pelly, HBM's Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, Viceroy's Camp, Bombay, to His Excellency Sir Henry Bartle Edward Frere, Aden

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing a copy of a despatch (no longer enclosed) from the Under Secretary to the Government of India conveying to Pelly the orders of the Viceroy and Governor-General that he proceed to Aden and place himself under Sir Bartle Frere's orders.The letter also informs Frere of his intended departure from Bombay on 25 November and his hopes of arriving at Aden about the 1st December.
